titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit homeowners to deduct points incurred in connection with the purchase, improvement, or refinancing of a residence.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/21/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow homeowners to deduct the full amount of prepaid interest in connection with the refinancing of their principal residences for the taxable year in which paid.
